skillTree.localised_description: Deadly giant bats the size of dragons, capable of plucking men from the field and stunning warhorses into paralysis.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.

enabled_if: Winds of magic power is 15 or greater
target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

ui_effects.localised_text: Winds of Magic effects are increased by every affected unit

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.
A dark pact has been made with darker Gods to guarantee victory.
Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Experience gain: +10% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Lords

	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Experience gain: +30% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
"See my coat of crimson armour? It is strengthened by thine blood and fear."
"Look into mine eyes, mortal; what glories do you see?"
The sword-strikes of mortal man are but clumsy, childish lunges before the preternatural speed of a Vampire.
Strike hard, strike true.
The strength of this Vampire to endure the centuries is beyond compare.
To look upon this Undead Lord is to witness true and absolute horror!

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

Requires line of sight to the target

effects.description: Overcast spell: "Command of the Living Upgraded"

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Crypt Ghouls

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: This adept uses the Winds of Magic to seek out arcane artefacts.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +30%

skillTree.localised_description: There is no Vampiric society, no aristocracy or blue-blooded royalty amongst the Undead. Vampires crave power, and through strength and cunning they take it. Frailty is punished by deathâ€”final, true death.
Awake O Dead, for there can be no rest for ye beneath the earth.

effects.description:
Attrition: -25% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "I am mighty, none dare challenge me!"
"Arise my host, my Unliving minions - bring me victory!"

skillTree.localised_description: A Lord of Necromancy's minions do not suffer exhaustion, they can walk for leagues and never suffer.
Once slain in battle, the foe belongs to the Undead Lord, and will rise again, eager to serve.

The Dead Rise Again: +10% hit points for destroyed units restored after battle
The Dead Rise Again: +15% hit points for destroyed units restored after battle

skillTree.localised_description: A powerful, vigorous Lord of Darkness will see the Children of the Night gather unto them.

skillTree.localised_description: The sun is no ally of the dead - a sky scorched black, or darkest night, will invigorate the Unliving.

skillTree.localised_description: Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.
Such a beast is all but impossible to destroy - an immortal horror doomed to haunt eternity!

skillTree.localised_description: W'soran's scions are masters at the art of Necromancy, to dabble in such will be a boon.
This Lord has endless forbearance, a timeless patience crafted over millennia.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Glory in your dark majesty, my lord."
Vampires and their liche-servants are devious creatures; manipulative with many mortal servants in their thrall.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:

	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
Well built, robust. Powerful.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +10%
	(all units in army)
